member.name: T:Neovolve.BuildTaskExecutor.Tasks.WildcardFileSearchTask
member.summary: The class is provides the common implementation for searching for files using a wildcard search pattern.

remarks.para: The only wildcard character supported is the asterix (*) character. The task will identify the base search directory as the last absolute directory in the search path that does not have a wildcard character. All file paths after this point are evaluated against a regular expression built against the wildcard path value.

note.b: The regular expression will match wildcard patterns across multiple directories.
note.para:
The pattern C:\Temp\Some*\Path\output.txt will match all the following paths:
C:\Temp\Some\Path\output.txt
C:\Temp\SomeCustom\Path\output.txt
C:\Temp\Some\NestedDirectory\Path\output.txt.
The wildcard character also matches zero characters as indicated in the above example.

member.name: T:Neovolve.BuildTaskExecutor.Services.TaskResolver
member.summary: The class provides the ability to resolve a task from a task name.

para.b: Do not import this type into an constructor decorated with the .

note.para: This action will cause a circular reference between the and the instance trying to import it. MEF will throw a composition error in this scenario. The way to achieve this result is to import the as a property on the class.

member.name: T:Neovolve.BuildTaskExecutor.Services.TaskExecutor
member.summary: The class is used to execute the required task based on a set of arguments.

remarks.para: The first argument needs to match a name for an available task.

para.b: Do not import this type into an constructor decorated with the .

note.para: This action will cause a circular reference between the and the instance trying to import it. MEF will throw a composition error in this scenario. The way to achieve this result is to import the as a property on the class.

member.summary: Executes the specified arguments.
member.returns: A instance that indicates whether a task could be executed successfully.

member.summary: Gets or sets the resolver.
